music.Chord

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Chord Key.getChord(int rootScalePos) 
      Chord Key.getChord(int rootScalePos, boolean is7th)

      Chord Chord.invert(int inversions)
      Returns a new Chord by inverting the current Chord<\tt>.
      Chord Chord.shiftOctave(int amt)
      Returns a new Chord identical to this one, but with each of its notes shifted by amt octaves.
      Methods in music with parameters of type Chord 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Chord.containsChord(Chord oth)
      Checks if all the notes in a given Chord are also in this chord.
      boolean Chord.containsChordIgnoreOctave(Chord oth)
      Checks if all the notes in a given Chord are also in this chord, ignoring octaves.
